text: The Mystery of a Hansom Cab is a re-issue in 1935 of the 1925 Australian silent film of the same name based on the novel The Mystery of a Hansom Cab. It was released by Pathescope.https://archive.org/stream/kinematographyea23unse#page/90/mode/2up/search/%22hansom+cab%22 ==References== Category:1936 films Category:films based on British novels Category:British black-and-white films Category:British films
title: The Mystery of a Hansom Cab (1935 film)
